movie.title: 6 Days
movie.plot: London, England, April 1980. Six terrorists assault the Embassy of Iran and take hostages. For six days, tense negotiations are held while the authorities decide whether a military squad should intervene.

events.title: hostages are taken in the Iranian Embassy in London
